document_data.name: Will Turnstone
document_data.mainbody: '''Will Turnstone''' was a [[halfling]] scout and a companion of [[Dorn Graybrook]] during the [[Rage of Dragons]] of [[1373 DR]].
document_data.Description: He was handsome, with black lovelocks and a heart-shaped face. He often wore leather armor.{{cite book/The Rage|7|1}}
document_data.Equipment: Will Turnstone employed a ''[[hornblade]]'' weapon in battle.{{cite book/The Rage|12|1}} He wore [[calfskin]] gloves.
